member.name: T:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.CommonWrapper
member.summary:
Wrapper for classifiers such as SvmLight and LibLinear, which use separate training and classification executables. This also assumes that all instance files have lines in the following format:
label feature1:value1 feature2:value2 ... featureN:valueN
The one-based feature numbers are sorted ascendingly left to right.

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.CommonWrapper._featureCondensers
member.summary: A pool of unused feature condensers

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.CommonWrapper.#cctor
member.summary: Static constructor

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.CommonWrapper.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Newline sequence used by this wrapper

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.CommonWrapper.InitializeOptions(LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Options)
member.summary: Initializes this wrapper with options

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.CommonWrapper.GetPredictions(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String[],System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Int32,System.Int32},System.String[]@,System.Single[]@)
member.summary: Gets trains a subset model and runs it on validation instances

Writes filtered vectors to file, condensing the feature space at it goes. The motivation behind condensing the feature space is that the space containing the unfiltered vectors is much larger than the space containing the filtered vectors, and these extra dimensions can be removed with no degradation of performance - indeed, performance is greatly enhanced because the classifier has only a fraction of the original dimensions to worry about with.
member.param: Maps feature numbers in vectors to feature numbers in this subset. This is used in applications of feature grouping, where many features from vectors map to a single feature in the subset (e.g., binarized features)
Feature name transform to use when condensing feature vectors
Whether or not to include zero-vectors in the output file

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.CommonWrapper.Cleanup
member.summary: Removes all intermediate files that were created while training and testing subset

member.summary: Gets train process argument

member.summary: Gets test validate arguments

member.summary: Gets path to training instances

member.summary: Whether or not to include zero-vectors in the validation data. (true/false, default: true)

member.summary: Runs feature selection with given options
Gets the best subset from an array of subsets
member.param: Maximum number of threads to use for evaluation

member.summary: Gets the best subset from an array of subsets using cross-validation
member.param: Maximum number of threads to use for evaluation

member.summary: Gets the best subset from an array of subsets
member.param: Maximum number of threads to use for evaluation

member.name: T:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option
member.summary: FeatureSelector options

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.ContinuePreviousSelection
member.summary: Whether or not to start current selection from end of previous selection, based on the contents of the log file specified by LogPath. (true/false, default: false)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.CrossFoldValidator
member.summary: Type name of the cross-fold validator to use. If not specified, the default CrossFoldValidator will be used with its default number of folds. (optional)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.EvaluateInteractionsBetweenSelectedFeatures
member.summary: Once the final feature set has been selected, you can test feature interactions by combining all possible feature pairs into new features and (using the selected and interaction features) running the selection again. (true/false, default: false)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.ExitOnErrorAction
member.summary: Action to take when exiting the feature selector in response to an error. See FeatureSelector.ExitOnAction enumeration for more information. (ExitEnvironment/ThrowException, default: ExitEnvironment)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.FeatureFilters
member.summary: Comma-separated list of type names of feature filters to use. Only valid when doing forward selection. (optional)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.FeatureNumberGroupFileNumLines
member.summary: Number of lines in the feature number group file. Providing this option prevents runtime determination, which is IO-heavy when many features exist. ([0,int.MaxValue], no default)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.FeatureNumberGroupPath
member.summary: Path to file that maps each feature number to a feature group ID. (mandatory)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.FloatingSelection
member.summary: Whether or not to perform floating selection, where backtracking is performed after each subset round in which a performance increase is observed. See Pudil (1994). (true/false, default: false)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.GroupNamePath
member.summary: Path to file that maps each feature group ID to a longer, more informative name. (mandatory)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.LeaveOneOut
member.summary: Whether or not to do leave-one-out evaluation of the feature groups. (true/false, default: false)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.LogPath
member.summary: Path to log file for selection. (mandatory)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.MaxRoundsWithoutImprovement
member.summary: Maximum number of rounds to run when no improvement is observed. ([0,int.MaxValue], default: int.MaxValue)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.MaxThreads
member.summary: Maximum number of threads to use. ([1, int.MaxValue], default: 1)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.NumSelectedFeatureGroups
member.summary: Number of feature groups to select. ([1, int.MaxValue], default: int.MaxValue)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.PerformanceIncreaseRequirement
member.summary: Amount performance must increase between rounds in order to continue selection. ([float.MinValue, float.MaxValue], default: float.MinValue)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.PredefinedSubsetsPath
member.summary: Path to file containing predefined subsets, where each line in file is a space-separated sequence of integers corresponding to the feature groups for the subset. (optional)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.Scorer
member.summary: Type name of the scorer to use. If not specified, an FMeasureScorer will be used. (optional)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.TrainingInstancesPath
member.summary: Path to file that contains training instances. (mandatory)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.TrainingInstancesInMemory
member.summary: Whether or not to store training instances in memory. If false, all training instances are read from disk to train each model - this saves memory at the cost of speed. (true/false, default: true)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.ValidationInstancesPath
member.summary: Path to file that contains validation instances. (if CrossFoldValidator.Option.NumFolds is > 1 (the default), this cannot be given; otherwise, this is mandatory)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.Verbosity
member.summary: Verbosity level. Either Normal or All is required for feature selection restart using ContinuePreviousSelection. See FeatureSelector.Verbosity enumeration for more information. (Essential/Normal/All, default: Normal)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.FeatureSelector.Option.Wrapper
member.summary: Type name of the classification wrapper to use. (mandatory)

member.name: T:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator
member.summary: Specifies the cross-validation setup

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.InitializeOptions(LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Options)
member.summary: Initializes options

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.InitializeOptions(LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Options,System.Int32[]@)
member.summary: Initializes options
member.param: Movement of training instances if randomizing or null if no randomization is performed

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.ModifyValidationScorer(System.Int32,System.Int32,LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.Scorer)
member.summary: Modifies the validation scorer - called immediately before subsets are evaluated

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.Cleanup
member.summary: Cleans up any resources created/held by this validator

member.name: P:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.Folds
member.summary: Gets the number of folds to use (default: 1, i.e., no cross-validation)

member.name: P:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.BlockSizes
member.summary: Gets the block sizes for the instances

member.name: T:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.Option
member.summary: CrossFoldValidator options

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.Option.InstanceBlockRandomizationSeed
member.summary: Seed value to use for random number generator that randomizes instance blocks. ([int.MinValue,int.MaxValue], default: picked by Random() constructor)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.Option.InstanceBlocksPath
member.summary: Path to file that defines the instance block sizes. (optional)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.Option.NumFolds
member.summary: Number of folds to validate. ([1,int.MaxValue], default: 10)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.CrossFoldValidator.Option.RandomizeInstanceBlocks
member.summary: Whether or not to randomize training instances before performing cross-validation. This is essential in situations where instance features or class labels are somehow dependent on the instances' positions in the training instance file. The word "blocks" is used due to the capability of treating groups of instances as a single unit; however, unless InstanceBlocksPath is defined, each training instance is treated as its own block. (true/false, default: false)

member.name: T:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.SvmPerfWrapper
member.summary: Performs feature selection using SvmPerf

member.summary: Constructor

member.summary: Initializes this wrapper with options

member.summary: Gets predicted labels and their scores

member.name: P:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.SvmPerfWrapper.TrainProcessArguments
member.summary: Gets the training process arguments. Currently uses "-w 3" and "-l 1" (F1 loss) for all processes.

member.name: P:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.SvmPerfWrapper.ValidateProcessArguments
member.summary: Gets the validation process arguments

member.summary: SvmPerfWrapper options

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.SvmPerfWrapper.Option.C
member.summary: Tradeoff between training error and margin (-c in SvmPerf training). ([float.MinValue, float.MaxValue], default: 0.01)

member.name: T:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer
member.summary: Treats each validation instance independently. Scores f-measure. Tunes threshold.

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.GetBest(LAIR.Collections.Generic.Set{LAIR.MachineLearning.Evaluation.ConfusionMatrix},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Boolean,LAIR.MachineLearning.Evaluation.ConfusionMatrix@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Gets the best confusion matrix and score
member.param: Whether or not to macro-average f-measures

member.summary: Constructor

member.summary: Initializes options

member.summary: Scores predictions
member.returns: Score of predicted labels given true labels

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.GetThresholdedMatrixes
member.summary: Gets threshold matrixes

member.name: M:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.AddToMatrixes(System.String,System.Single,System.String,LAIR.Collections.Generic.Set{LAIR.MachineLearning.Evaluation.ConfusionMatrix})
member.summary: Adds a true/predicted label pair to thresholded prediction matrixes, using the no-judgment class if needed.

member.name: P:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.FMeasureLabels
member.summary: Gets labels used for f-measure

member.name: T:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.Option
member.summary: Options

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.Option.BlockScoring
member.summary: Whether or not to do block scoring during cross-validation. In block scoring, a block (or group) of instances is classified and the highest scoring instance is selected for scoring (other instances are ignored). This only applies to cross-validation setups in which InstanceBlocksPath is supplied to the cross-validator. (true/false, default: false)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.Option.LabelsPath
member.summary: Path to file that lists all possible labels output by the classifier. (mandatory)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.Option.ThresholdInc
member.summary: Threshold increment when doing threshold tuning. ((0, float.MaxValue], default: 0.01)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.Option.ThresholdMax
member.summary: Maximum threshold when doing threshold tuning. ([float.MinValue, float.MaxValue], default: 1)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.Option.ThresholdMin
member.summary: Minimum threshold when doing threshold tuning. ([float.MinValue, float.MaxValue], default: 0)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.FMeasureScorer.Option.UseMacroAverage
member.summary: Whether or not to use macro-averaging for multiple classes. (true/false, default: false)

member.name: T:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Scorers.AccuracyScorer
member.summary: Scores predictions for accuracy

member.summary: Initializes the options for this scorer

member.summary: Gets accuracy score for predictions

member.summary: Gets predicted labels and their scores

member.summary: SvmLightWrapper options

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.SvmLightWrapper.Option.C
member.summary: Tradeoff between training error and margin. ([float.MinValue, float.MaxValue], default: [avg. x*x]^-1)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.SvmLightWrapper.Option.J
member.summary: Cost factor, by which training errors on positive examples outweigh errors on negative examples. ([float.MinValue, float.MaxValue], default: 1)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.SvmLightWrapper.Option.P
member.summary: Fraction of unlabeled exapmles to be classified into the positive class. ([0, 1], default: ratio in labeled data)

member.name: F:LAIR.MachineLearning.FeatureSelection.FeatureSelector.Wrappers.SvmLightWrapper.Option.M
member.summary: Size of cache for kernel evaluations in MB. ([5, int.MaxValue], default: 40)
